name: Jruns
description:
The year is 2147. Mankind has become... uh, how shall I put it... you'd better see for yourself!

Casual action-strategy set in a distant dystopian future.

How to play:
Mouse: move
Escape: pause
Move Jruns on the food to increase their mood. Jruns cannot cross obstacles to get to the food.
Move Jruns on empty holes to change their position. Unlike eating, they travel underground and ignore obstacles!

How to win or lose:
There are three types of victory: food counter completion gives you a star ending. If everyone alive it's a double-star victory. And making everyone alive & happy gives a best achievement in the game, a three-star victory.
Keep them eating or they will turn into ghosts! If everyone turned into ghosts, you lose.

Tips:
Try to keep Jruns happy and not starve. Happy Jruns have lifespan increased. Hungry Jruns need a specific food to get happy again.
You can always revive a ghost, so ghosts in the mid game can be an advantage!
You have 3 steps delay at the start, but you can move!

Created in 6 days for Houdini Game Jam 2021.
